trans-unit.source: Provides control capability to validate whether the value of the associated input control is different from its initial value.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制項功能，以驗證相關聯輸入控制項的值是否不同於其初始值。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This class behaves identically to the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的行為即會相同 asp.net<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator?displayProperty=fullName>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controls on a form raise validator controls on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>表單上的控制項引發時要執行驗證表單提交給伺服器表單上的驗證程式控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: To disable automatic validation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用自動驗證，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>至`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The Web validator gets and sets the common properties of Web based validator.
trans-unit.target: Web 驗證程式會取得並設定 Web 架構的驗證程式的通用屬性。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: An aggregated Web validator.
trans-unit.target: 彙總的 Web 驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: Called during the validation stage when ASP.NET processes a Web Form.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 處理 Web 表單時，在驗證階段期間呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validator is valid, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果驗證程式是否有效，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base value for the validator.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證程式的基底值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: During validation, the validator compares a submitted value to the value of the InitialValue property.
trans-unit.target: 在驗證期間，驗證程式會比較 InitialValue 屬性的值來送出的值。

trans-unit.source: If the values are the same, the validator assumes that the value for the required field has not been filled in and reports a validation error.
trans-unit.target: 如果值相同，驗證程式會假設尚未填入必要欄位的值，並報告驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The base value for the validator.
trans-unit.target: 驗證程式的基底值。
